title: PROBLEM
body: i was on the middle of a ranked game playing rengar, then the client shoted down, and now i cant log back into the game, it says that "Its Unable to connect to the Login Queue, Check the server status" i already tried with hextech tool, what can i do?

replies.body: Nevermind, its already fixed, by itself, something is weird tho,, i still got the victory, it looks like mi champion was still conected, even tho i wasnt in the client, but wth, thx anyway :) love you Riot

Ayyyy glad you were able to get back in! Don't hesitate to check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if it happens again, but if that doesn't help hit us up here or in a ticket ^_^!
